creator: chi@atypon.com
text:
In the class org.apache.catalina.connector.RequestFacade, the method 
getRemoteHost() should delegate the call to request.getRemoteHost() instead of 
request.getRemoteAddr(). This causes the ServletRequest.getRemoteHost() always 
return the String form of the remote IP address.

Chi
